title: Leave buster
body:
Hi,Im new here so I don't know much about the game. But last night I was playing and I left the game. 
I didn't know I couldn't leave,anyways I got a leave buster message and is asking me to type I agree and I did but the ok thing wont work 
How can I fix this ?
thanks in advance!

replies.body: Hey there, what happens if you capitalize the A in agree?  If it's still not working then there might be a network issue preventing your submission from reaching our server.  Restart your client just in case.  Otherwise, start off with the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out this possibility.  Let me know if that helps.
Thank you! You are a life saver  that worked haha I capitalized the A and it worked thanks !
